body.p: The Western Union Telegraph Company was formed in 1851, after the New York and Mississippi Valley Printing Telegraph Company consolidated various regional telegraph companies in 1856, and secured Samuel Morse’s telegraph patent. By 1861 they had created the nation’s first transcontinental telegraph service.
